docs.text: Welcome to Task Manager
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Комментарии API для комментариев Создание нового комментария Запрос: POST /api/create-comment/ { "text": "Тестовый комментарий", "user": 4, "task_user_relation": 3 } Ответ: { "id": 5, "user_name": "Lizaveta", "task_title": "Make a lab3", "text": "Тестовый комментарий", "user": 4, "task_user_relation": 3 } Отображение комментариев к каждому назначению задачи c отображением пользователя и заголовка задачи Запрос: GET /api/comment-list/ Ответ: [ { "id": 1, "user_name": "Lizaveta", "task_title": "Make a lab1", "text": "Супер, задача понятна!!", "user": 4, "task_user_relation": 1 }, { "id": 3, "user_name": "Lizaveta", "task_title": "Write a report", "text": "Успеть все до НГ", "user": 4, "task_user_relation": 8 }, { "id": 4, "user_name": "Nikita", "task_title": "Buy tickets for the plane", "text": "Тестовый комент", "user": 6, "task_user_relation": 11 } ] Удаление комментария Запрос: DELETE /api/delete-comment/<int:comment_id>/
docs.title: API for comments

docs.text: Запрос: POST /api/create-comment/ { "text": "Тестовый комментарий", "user": 4, "task_user_relation": 3 } Ответ: { "id": 5, "user_name": "Lizaveta", "task_title": "Make a lab3", "text": "Тестовый комментарий", "user": 4, "task_user_relation": 3 }
docs.title: Создание нового комментария

docs.text: Запрос: GET /api/comment-list/ Ответ: [ { "id": 1, "user_name": "Lizaveta", "task_title": "Make a lab1", "text": "Супер, задача понятна!!", "user": 4, "task_user_relation": 1 }, { "id": 3, "user_name": "Lizaveta", "task_title": "Write a report", "text": "Успеть все до НГ", "user": 4, "task_user_relation": 8 }, { "id": 4, "user_name": "Nikita", "task_title": "Buy tickets for the plane", "text": "Тестовый комент", "user": 6, "task_user_relation": 11 } ]
docs.title: Отображение комментариев к каждому назначению задачи c отображением пользователя и заголовка задачи

docs.text: Запрос: DELETE /api/delete-comment/<int:comment_id>/
docs.title: Удаление комментария

docs.text: Модели User class User(models.Model): username = models.CharField(max_length=255) email = models.EmailField(unique=True) password = models.CharField(max_length=255) related_tasks = models.ManyToManyField('Task', through='TaskUserRelation', related_name='users') Task class Task(models.Model): title = models.CharField(max_length=255) description = models.TextField() deadline = models.DateTimeField() completed_choices = [ ('в работе', 'В работе'), ('запланирована', 'Запланирована'), ('завершена', 'Завершена'), ] completed = models.CharField(max_length=20, choices=completed_choices) category = models.ForeignKey('Category', on_delete=models.CASCADE) aim = models.ForeignKey('Aim', on_delete=models.CASCADE) TaskUserRelation class TaskUserRelation(models.Model): user = models.ForeignKey(User, on_delete=models.CASCADE) task = models.ForeignKey('Task', on_delete=models.CASCADE) Comment class Comment(models.Model): text = models.TextField() user = models.ForeignKey(User, on_delete=models.CASCADE) task_user_relation = models.ForeignKey(TaskUserRelation, on_delete=models.CASCADE) Aim class Aim(models.Model): title = models.CharField(max_length=255) description = models.TextField() date_start = models.DateField() date_end = models.DateField() status_choices = [ ('выполнена', 'Выполнена'), ('не выполнена', 'Не выполнена'), ] status = models.CharField(max_length=20, choices=status_choices) Category class Category(models.Model): name = models.CharField(max_length=255)
docs.title: Models

docs.text: class User(models.Model): username = models.CharField(max_length=255) email = models.EmailField(unique=True) password = models.CharField(max_length=255) related_tasks = models.ManyToManyField('Task', through='TaskUserRelation', related_name='users')
docs.title: User

docs.text: class Task(models.Model): title = models.CharField(max_length=255) description = models.TextField() deadline = models.DateTimeField() completed_choices = [ ('в работе', 'В работе'), ('запланирована', 'Запланирована'), ('завершена', 'Завершена'), ] completed = models.CharField(max_length=20, choices=completed_choices) category = models.ForeignKey('Category', on_delete=models.CASCADE) aim = models.ForeignKey('Aim', on_delete=models.CASCADE)
docs.title: Task

docs.text: class TaskUserRelation(models.Model): user = models.ForeignKey(User, on_delete=models.CASCADE) task = models.ForeignKey('Task', on_delete=models.CASCADE)
docs.title: TaskUserRelation

docs.text: class Comment(models.Model): text = models.TextField() user = models.ForeignKey(User, on_delete=models.CASCADE) task_user_relation = models.ForeignKey(TaskUserRelation, on_delete=models.CASCADE)
docs.title: Comment

docs.text: class Aim(models.Model): title = models.CharField(max_length=255) description = models.TextField() date_start = models.DateField() date_end = models.DateField() status_choices = [ ('выполнена', 'Выполнена'), ('не выполнена', 'Не выполнена'), ] status = models.CharField(max_length=20, choices=status_choices)
docs.title: Aim

docs.text: class Category(models.Model): name = models.CharField(max_length=255)
docs.title: Category

docs.text: Задачи API для задач Создание задачи Запрос: POST /api/tasks/create/ Content-Type: application/json { "category_name": "Life", "aim_title": "A trip to the mountains for skiing", "title": "Still alive", "description": "string", "deadline": "2023-12-17T22:38:10.488Z", "completed": "в работе", "category": 3, "aim": 2 } Ответ: { "id": 14, "category_name": "Life", "aim_title": "A trip to the mountains for skiing", "title": "Still alive", "description": "string", "deadline": "2023-12-17T22:38:10.488000Z", "completed": "в работе", "category": 3, "aim": 2 } Получение информации о конкретной задаче Запрос: GET /api/tasks/<int:pk>/ Ответ: { "id": 4, "aim": "Close Computer Networks", "category": "University", "title": "Make a lab4", "description": "Tasks in the telegram", "deadline": "2023-11-30T00:00:00Z", "completed": "завершена" } Редактирование статуса задачи Запрос: PUT /api/tasks/<int:task_id>/update-status/ Content-Type: application/json { "completed": "в работе" } Ответ: { "completed": "в работе" } Вывод всех задач, где цель не достигнута Запрос: GET /api/tasks/uncompleted-aims/ Ответ: [ { "id": 1, "category_name": "University", "aim_title": "Close Computer Networks", "title": "Make a lab1", "description": "Tasks in the telegram", "deadline": "2023-09-22T00:00:00Z", "completed": "завершена", "category": 1, "aim": 1 }, { "id": 2, "category_name": "University", "aim_title": "Close Computer Networks", "title": "Make a lab2", "description": "Tasks in the telegram", "deadline": "2023-10-20T00:00:00Z", "completed": "завершена", "category": 1, "aim": 1 }, { "id": 3, "category_name": "University", "aim_title": "Close Computer Networks", "title": "Make a lab3", "description": "Tasks in the telegram", "deadline": "2023-11-17T00:00:00Z", "completed": "завершена", "category": 1, "aim": 1 }, { "id": 4, "category_name": "University", "aim_title": "Close Computer Networks", "title": "Make a lab4", "description": "Tasks in the telegram", "deadline": "2023-11-30T00:00:00Z", "completed": "завершена", "category": 1, "aim": 1 }, { "id": 5, "category_name": "University", "aim_title": "Close Computer Networks", "title": "Make a lab5", "description": "Tasks in the telegram", "deadline": "2023-12-22T00:00:00Z", "completed": "завершена", "category": 1, "aim": 1 }, { "id": 6, "category_name": "University", "aim_title": "Close Computer Networks", "title": "Make a lab6", "description": "Tasks in the telegram", "deadline": "2024-01-15T00:00:00Z", "completed": "запланирована", "category": 1, "aim": 1 }, { "id": 7, "category_name": docs.title: API for tasks

docs.text: Запрос: POST /api/tasks/create/ Content-Type: application/json { "category_name": "Life", "aim_title": "A trip to the mountains for skiing", "title": "Still alive", "description": "string", "deadline": "2023-12-17T22:38:10.488Z", "completed": "в работе", "category": 3, "aim": 2 } Ответ: { "id": 14, "category_name": "Life", "aim_title": "A trip to the mountains for skiing", "title": "Still alive", "description": "string", "deadline": "2023-12-17T22:38:10.488000Z", "completed": "в работе", "category": 3, "aim": 2 }

docs.text: Запрос: GET /api/tasks/<int:pk>/ Ответ: { "id": 4, "aim": "Close Computer Networks", "category": "University", "title": "Make a lab4", "description": "Tasks in the telegram", "deadline": "2023-11-30T00:00:00Z", "completed": "завершена" }

docs.text: Запрос: PUT /api/tasks/<int:task_id>/update-status/ Content-Type: application/json { "completed": "в работе" } Ответ: { "completed": "в работе" }

docs.text: Назначение задач пользователям API для назначения задач Вывод всех назначений Запрос: GET /api/assign-task-to-user/ Ответ: [ { "id": 1, "task_title": "Make a lab1", "user_name": "Lizaveta", "user": 4, "task": 1 }, { "id": 2, "task_title": "Make a lab2", "user_name": "Lizaveta", "user": 4, "task": 2 }, { "id": 3, "task_title": "Make a lab3", "user_name": "Lizaveta", "user": 4, "task": 3 }, { "id": 4, "task_title": "Make a lab4", "user_name": "Lizaveta", "user": 4, "task": 4 }, { "id": 5, "task_title": "Make a lab5", "user_name": "Lizaveta", "user": 4, "task": 5 }, { "id": 6, "task_title": "Make a lab6", "user_name": "Lizaveta", "user": 4, "task": 6 }, { "id": 7, "task_title": "Buy equipment", "user_name": "Lizaveta", "user": 4, "task": 9 }, { "id": 8, "task_title": "Write a report", "user_name": "Lizaveta", "user": 4, "task": 10 }, { "id": 9, "task_title": "Book a hotel", "user_name": "Ekaterina", "user": 5, "task": 7 }, { "id": 10, "task_title": "Buy equipment", "user_name": "Ekaterina", "user": 5, "task": 9 } ] Назначить задачу пользователю Запрос: POST /api/assign-task-to-user/ { "user": 5, "task": 1 } Ответ: { "id": 17, "task_title": "Make a lab1", "user_name": "Ekaterina", "user": 5, "task": 1 }
docs.title: API for task_user_relations

docs.text: Запрос: GET /api/assign-task-to-user/ Ответ: [ { "id": 1, "task_title": "Make a lab1", "user_name": "Lizaveta", "user": 4, "task": 1 }, { "id": 2, "task_title": "Make a lab2", "user_name": "Lizaveta", "user": 4, "task": 2 }, { "id": 3, "task_title": "Make a lab3", "user_name": "Lizaveta", "user": 4, "task": 3 }, { "id": 4, "task_title": "Make a lab4", "user_name": "Lizaveta", "user": 4, "task": 4 }, { "id": 5, "task_title": "Make a lab5", "user_name": "Lizaveta", "user": 4, "task": 5 }, { "id": 6, "task_title": "Make a lab6", "user_name": "Lizaveta", "user": 4, "task": 6 }, { "id": 7, "task_title": "Buy equipment", "user_name": "Lizaveta", "user": 4, "task": 9 }, { "id": 8, "task_title": "Write a report", "user_name": "Lizaveta", "user": 4, "task": 10 }, { "id": 9, "task_title": "Book a hotel", "user_name": "Ekaterina", "user": 5, "task": 7 }, { "id": 10, "task_title": "Buy equipment", "user_name": "Ekaterina", "user": 5, "task": 9 } ]
docs.title: Вывод всех назначений

docs.text: Запрос: POST /api/assign-task-to-user/ { "user": 5, "task": 1 } Ответ: { "id": 17, "task_title": "Make a lab1", "user_name": "Ekaterina", "user": 5, "task": 1 }
docs.title: Назначить задачу пользователю

docs.text: Пользователи API для пользователей Вывод всех пользователей Запрос: GET /api/users/ Ответ: [ { "id": 4, "username": "Lizaveta", "email": "liza@example.com", "password": "likast1233", "related_tasks": [ 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 9, 10 ] }, { "id": 5, "username": "Ekaterina", "email": "katya@mail.com", "password": "stars1233", "related_tasks": [ 7, 9, 5, 4 ] }, { "id": 6, "username": "Nikita", "email": "nikita@gmail.com", "password": "korotki90", "related_tasks": [ 8, 9, 11 ] } ] Получение информации о назначенных пользователю задачах Запрос: GET /api/users/<int:user_id>/tasks/status/ Ответ: { "in_progress_tasks": [ { "id": 9, "category_name": "Life", "aim_title": "A trip to the mountains for skiing", "title": "Buy equipment", "description": "Everyone should buy more things that are missing", "deadline": "2024-01-20T00:00:00Z", "completed": "в работе", "category": 3, "aim": 2 } ], "planned_tasks": [ { "id": 6, "category_name": "University", "aim_title": "Close Computer Networks", "title": "Make a lab6", "description": "Tasks in the telegram", "deadline": "2024-01-15T00:00:00Z", "completed": "запланирована", "category": 1, "aim": 1 } ], "completed_tasks": [ { "id": 1, "category_name": "University", "aim_title": "Close Computer Networks", "title": "Make a lab1", "description": "Tasks in the telegram", "deadline": "2023-09-22T00:00:00Z", "completed": "завершена", "category": 1, "aim": 1 }, { "id": 2, "category_name": "University", "aim_title": "Close Computer Networks", "title": "Make a lab2", "description": "Tasks in the telegram", "deadline": "2023-10-20T00:00:00Z", "completed": "завершена", "category": 1, "aim": 1 }, { "id": 3, "category_name": "University", "aim_title": "Close Computer Networks", "title": "Make a lab3", "description": "Tasks in the telegram", "deadline": "2023-11-17T00:00:00Z", "completed": "завершена", "category": 1, "aim": 1 }, { "id": 4, "category_name": "University", "aim_title": "Close Computer Networks", "title": "Make a lab4", "description": "Tasks in the telegram", "deadline": "2023-11-30T00:00:00Z", "completed": "завершена", "category": 1, "aim": 1 }, { "id": 5, "category_name": "University", "aim_title": "Close Computer Networks", "title": "Make a lab5", "description": "Tasks in the telegram", "deadline": "2023-12-22T00:00:00Z", "completed": "завершена", "category": 1, "aim": 1 }, { "id": 10, "category_name": "Work", "aim_title": "Complete the tender 4 sites", "title": "Write a report", "description": "Tender 4 sites", "deadline": "2023-10-10T00:00:00Z", "completed": "завершена", "category": 2, "aim": 3 } ] } Регистрация пользователя Запрос: POST /auth/users Content-Type: application/json { "email": "user@example.com", "username": "example", "password": "fire123" } Ответ: { "email": "user@example.com", "username": "example", "id": 2 } Авторизация пользователя Запрос: POST auth/token/login/ { "username": "example", "password": "fire123" } Ответ: { "auth_token": "a273aa16b65d9ecb4e01d4ff71eccd7c0dd99462" } Редактирование авторизованного пользователя Запрос: PATCH /auth/users/me/ { "email": "userexample@example.com" } Ответ: { "email": "userexample@example.com", "username": "example", "id": 2 } Выход пользователя из системы Запрос: POST /auth/token/logout/ HEADERS: Authorization: Token a273aa16b65d9ecb4e01d4ff71eccd7c0dd9946 Ответ:
docs.title: API for users

docs.title: Получение информации о назначенных пользователю задачах

docs.text: Запрос: POST /auth/users Content-Type: application/json { "email": "user@example.com", "username": "example", "password": "fire123" } Ответ: { "email": "user@example.com", "username": "example", "id": 2 }
docs.title: Регистрация пользователя

docs.text: Запрос: POST auth/token/login/ { "username": "example", "password": "fire123" } Ответ: { "auth_token": "a273aa16b65d9ecb4e01d4ff71eccd7c0dd99462" }
docs.title: Авторизация пользователя

docs.text: Запрос: PATCH /auth/users/me/ { "email": "userexample@example.com" } Ответ: { "email": "userexample@example.com", "username": "example", "id": 2 }
docs.title: Редактирование авторизованного пользователя

docs.text: Запрос: POST /auth/token/logout/ HEADERS: Authorization: Token a273aa16b65d9ecb4e01d4ff71eccd7c0dd9946 Ответ:
